posts.post_content:
Most of these came from a set put together by a collector who had a pretty good eye. The lower-grade cards especially look nice. Please note that I've posted extra-large
scans that are pretty unforgiving. Just about every card below presents very well in hand -- they all look better in hand than in the huge scans.

Piedmonts

Persons, SGC 40/3: $94

Rockenfeld, SGC 35/2.5: SOLD

Westlake, PSA 3: SOLD

Old Mills

Bastian, SGC 40/3: SOLD

Bastian, PSA 4: SOLD

Bernhard, PSA 4: $189

Carey, SGC 60/5: $349

Elam, SGC 40/3: $139

Bill Hart, SGC 40/3: $94

Lipe, SGC 20/1.5: $53

Ray Ryan, SGC A: $44

Also willing to trade for mid-grade Piedmont SLers I need.

Please add $4 shipping no matter how many cards you buy. Shipping within United States only.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. Checks, money orders and cash are OK, too.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation.  :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions[/URL].

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]
